params.signature: The signature produced by an account signing the mint request.
The signature produced by an account signing the mint request.  returns (success, signer) Result of verification and the recovered address.

mintWithSignature((address,address,uint2.notice: Mints tokens according to the provided mint request.

verify((address,address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Verifies that a mint request is signed by an account holding          MINTER_ROLE (at the time of the function call).
